name: cypress-split-example
description: Split Cypress specs on GitHub Actions and CircleCI

scripts.block-0: SPLIT_TIME_THRESHOLD=0.1 SPLIT_FILE=timings.json SPLIT_OUTPUT_FILE=cypress/partials/block-0/output.json SPLIT=2 SPLIT_INDEX=0 xvfb-run -a npx cypress run
scripts.block-1: SPLIT_TIME_THRESHOLD=0.1 SPLIT_FILE=timings.json SPLIT_OUTPUT_FILE=cypress/partials/block-1/output.json SPLIT=2 SPLIT_INDEX=1 xvfb-run -a npx cypress run
scripts.reports:merge: mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json -o cypress/reports/combined.json && marge cypress/reports/combined.json --charts true --report-dir cypress/reports --reportFilename combined
scripts.timings:merge: npx cypress-split-merge --parent-folder cypress/partials --split-file output.json --output timings.json --set-gha-output merged-timings
scripts.debug: DEBUG=cypress-split SPLIT=6 SPLIT_INDEX=5 npx cypress run
